job.title: Senior Software Engineer (Java)
job.description: uWhy This Jobs a Big Deal brbruBuild the next exciting new product or feature that will ultimately help millions of people experience the world Join in various Developer forums and be part of a company wide web developer community affecting and driving web engineering decisionsbrbrOur team of engineers at all levels work with the business leaders in defining the product roadmap and come up with innovative solutions to grow the future of travel We design and develop our back end systems and REST APIs that serve hundreds of millions of searches a day collecting and parsing data across thousands of partners to get the best deals for our customersbrbru In This Role You Will Get To bruulliDrive mission critical projects with direct impact on the evolution of Pricelines businessliliInnovate with a crossfunctional agile team that continuously experiments iterates and delivers on new product objectivesliliShowcase fluency and development skills of Core Java or similar programming languagesliliLead mentor and guide less experienced developers in best practicesliliApply your programming skills towards building low latency and high throughput transactional services with continuous integration and automation testingliliImplement SQL composition skills that collects and queries data for investigation and analysis in real time from our applicationsliliApply your experience to understand our codebase systems and business requirements to effectively make changes to our applicationsliliInfluence and communicate team development efforts Influence what the best solutions are and communicate your findings to key business stakeholders brliulu Who You Are bruulliBachelors degree or higher in Computer Science or related fieldlili7 years of experience in software engineering and developmentliliExceptional coding experience with Core Java or similar programming languagesliliAn interest in being a mentor and influencing best practices with less experienced developersliliStrong grasp of SQL compositions skills for composing queries and analysisliliConfident with the utilization of Spring Frameworks Web Services and APIsliliEstablished and proven expertise with server side JavascriptliliAn Influencer of the use of Git and GitflowliliExperience with developing on Cloud especially GCP and AWSliliExperience in Microservices Kubernetes GKE preferable and DockersliliProven ability in Design and Architecture of complex highly scalable and performance driven applicationsliliIllustrated history of living the values necessary to Priceline Customer Innovation Team Accountability and TrustliliThe Right Results the Right Way is not just a motto at Priceline its a way of life Unquestionable integrity and ethics is essentialbrliulstronguWho We ArebrbrustrongWE ARE PRICELINEbrbrOur success as one of the biggest players in online travel is all thanks to our incredible dedicated team of talented employees Priceliners are focused on being the best travel deal makers in the world fueled by our passion to help everyone experience the moments that matter most in their lives Whether its a dream vacation your cousins graduation or your best friends wedding  we make travel affordable and accessible to our customersbrbrOur culture is unique and inspiring thats what our employees tell us Were a grownup startup We deliver the excitement of a new venture without the struggles and chaos that can come with a business that hasnt stabilizedbrbrWere on the cutting edge of innovative technologies We keep the customer at the center of all that we do Our ability to meet their needs relies on the strength of a workforce as diverse as the customers we serve We bring together employees from all walks of life and we are proud to provide the kind of inclusive environment that stimulates innovation creativity and collaborationbrbrWere on the cutting edge of innovative technologies We keep the customer at the center of all that we do Our ability to meet their needs relies on the strength of a workforce as diverse as the customers we serve We bring together employees from all walks of life and we are proud to provide the kind of inclusive environment that stimulates innovation creativity and collaborationbrbrPriceline is part of the Booking Holdings Inc Nasdaq BKNG family of companies a highly profitable global online travel company with a market capitalization of over 80 billion Our sister companies include Bookingcom BookingGo Agoda Kayak and OpenTablebrbrIf you want to be part of something truly special check us outbrbruDiversity Equity and Inclusion  Our CommitmentbrbruPriceline ensures equal employment opportunity to all employees and applicants without discrimination or harassment based on race religious creed color age sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin religion marital status medical condition disability military service pregnancy childbirth and related medical conditions or any other classification protected by governing lawbrbrustrongApplying for this positionbrbrstronguWere excited that you are interested in a career with us For all strongcurrent employeesstrong please use
